Ragnus' optics flash a bright red as he is called to 
battle, "Confirmed, Ragnus out."

After logging out of the system Ragnus runs to the nearest exit, the 
floor shaking with his heavy steps.  Finnally, after nearly a 
century, he was being called into battle.

If he could smile, he would be.

Reaching the exit he transformed into his dragon mode, and flew with 
great speed to the co-ordinates given.  Soon he would be in glorious 
battle once more.
